articles.title: Overseas Koreans Feted
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Feted
						
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A reception for overseas Koreans was given at the People's Palace of Culture on Feb. 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Koreans staying in the socialist homeland.
					
					 Also present there were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Hwang To Sik, director of the Bureau of Service for Koreans in Japan, Kang Ji Yong, director of the Bureau of Service for Overseas Compatriots, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Jung Rin said in an address made at the reception that the DPRK has demonstrated its dignity and might thanks to the rare ideological and theoretical activities and energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il, who cherished the lofty aim to glorify Korea after being born as the bright star of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il's inexhaustible energy and patriotic devotion are encouraging all the army and the people of the DPRK to give free rein to their mental power, adding that they are sure to open the gate to a thriving nation.
					
					 Ri Ki Sok, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, said in his speech that Kim Jong Il's birth was the greatest fortune that promised the eternal prosperity of the nation, adding that the DPRK could win victory and demonstrate glory through decades and centuries thanks to his birth on Feb. 16.
					
					 The speaker called upon overseas Koreans to make tangible contributions to further cementing all overseas compatriots' organizations as patriotic ones, building a thriving nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification under the uplifted banner of defending socialist homeland.

articles.title: Congratulation from Overseas Compatriots
articles.content:
Congratulation from Overseas Compatriots
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory message on Tuesday by members of the congratulatory group, delegation and visiting group of overseas compatriots staying in the homeland on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The message said:
					
					 The birth of you leader Kim Jong Il as a bright star over Mt. Paektu marked a great auspicious event of the nation as it brought rays of hope to the fellow countrymen seized with grief over being a stateless nation and guaranteed the nation's eternal happiness and glory and meant its great fortune as it promised the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 It is thanks to the historic February when the nation rejoiced over the birth of the peerless great man that overseas compatriots live with their chests thrown out full of great national pride and dignity even in alien lands, singing of the fortune of being members of the sun's nation blessed with the illustrious leaders.
					
					 The hearts of all of us are filled with conviction of sure victory that everything will go well in our homeland and lots of new changes will take place in the building of a thriving nation and it will tower higher over the earth under your wise leadership again this year, the 65th birthday of the great mother Party just as a thriving family is crowded with auspicious events everyday.
					
					 We will invariably believe and follow you as Heaven in the future, too, and dynamically advance along the road of patriotism in order to contribute to achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and building a rich and powerful country, keeping pace with the people in the homeland all out in the general march to unfailingly open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Congratulation from Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Congratulation from Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received congratulatory messages and letters from organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan on the occasion of his birthday.
					 Among them are the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, the Central Standing Committees of the Korean Youth League in Japan and the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers and School Clerks in Japan, the Central Standing Councils of the Union of Korean Education Association in Japan, the Korean Science and Technology Association in Japan and the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, the Standing Council of the Korean Amateur Athletic Federation in Japan, the Central  Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Medical Association in Japan and the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Students Union in Japan, the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Human Rights Federation in Japan and other central organizations of Chongryon and its affiliated organizations, the Choson Sinbo Company, the Korea News Service, the Hagu Bookshop, the Kumgangsan Opera Troupe, the Kumgang Insurance Company, the Korean Goods Sales Company, the Committee for Promoting Korea-Japan Economic Exchange, the Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan, the Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan, the Korean Press Hall and other enterprises, different prefectural headquarters of Chongryon, Joson University and Korean schools at all levels and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 They wished Kim Jong Il, the sun of mankind in the 21st century and the tender-hearted father of Koreans in Japan, good health, saying that his well-being is their strongest earnest wish.

articles.title: International Figure Skating Paektusan Prize Closes
articles.content:
International Figure Skating Paektusan Prize Closes
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The 19th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Prize, which opened on Monday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, closed with due ceremony at the Ice Rink here on Wednesday.
					 Present at the ceremony were Kwak Pom Gi and Pak Su Gil, vice-premiers of the Cabinet, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, officials concerned, sportspersons and working people in the city.
					
					 Present there were a congratulatory group of the Koreans in Japan led by Ri Ki Sok, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 Prizes were awarded to the figure skaters who displayed high technique in the festival at the closing ceremony.
					
					  Pak Hak Son, chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, declared the festival closed, expressing belief that figure skaters from different countries would meet with one another in the future, too, in the idea of independence, peace and friendship to contribute to glorifying the February holiday.
					
					 The ceremony was followed by demonstration performances by Korean and foreign figure skaters.

articles.title: Children's Camp Started
articles.content:
Children's Camp Started
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The camping of the first group of children this year started at the Jangjasan Children's Camp on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 A meeting to receive campers from different parts of the country took place on Feb. 16.
					
					 A report and speeches were made there.
					
					 A reporter and speakers said at the meeting that all the children should positively learn from the childhood of Kim Jong Il and briskly conduct various group activities and colorful sports and cultural amusement games and thus consolidate their knowledge and harden strong will and physical strength during the camping.
					
					 They called upon the campers to give full play to the collective spirit and prepare themselves to be reliable able workers of the future, knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy.
					
					 On the same day, Choe Ki Ryong, chairman of the Jagang Provincial People's Committee, and other officials concerned congratulated schoolchildren on their first camp for this year.

articles.title: Banquet Given by Chongryon in Tokyo
articles.content:
Banquet Given by Chongryon in Tokyo
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) arranged a banquet in Tokyo on Feb. 15 to celebrate General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 Present there were Chief Vice-Chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee Ho Jong Man and other officials of Chongryon and Korean men of commerce and industry.
					
					 Japanese figures from different strata, ambassadors of various countries and staff members of their embassies, representatives of international organizations and foreign correspondents in Japan were present there on invitation.
					
					 Ho Jong Man, addressing the banquet, said that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the general advance for effecting a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living this year marking the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities sincerely opt for national reconciliation and unity in the spirit of "By our nation itself", the basic idea of the June 15 joint declaration, the north-south relations would rapidly improve, he said, adding:
					
					 The Japanese authorities should opt for redressing Japan's past crimes and normalizing the relations with the DPRK in the basic spirit of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration.

articles.title: Italian Figure Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Italian Figure Praises Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Miriam Pellegrini Ferri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, issued a statement on Feb. 9 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Il advanced the grand goal to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, and has paid ceaseless visits to various domains of the national economy including the construction sites of the Huichon Power Station from the outset of this year, thus wisely leading the drive for building an economic power.
					
					 The DPRK has wrought world-startling miracles despite the imperialists' vicious moves against it, and such achievements greatly inspire the world people in their struggle for independence and progress, the statement noted.
					
					 The revolutionary people of the world carrying on the struggle for independence, peace and progress extend the highest glory to Kim Jong Il who has performed big feats in accomplishing the socialist cause, it stressed.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Nigeria
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued  in Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued bulletin captioned "Pluck of Leader Kim Jong Il" on Feb. 2 on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The bulletin in an article said that the imperialists' high-handed and arbitrary practices do not work on the DPRK and it is the steadfast attitude and stand of the DPRK to counter rifle firing with firing of artillery pieces and react to their hard-line policy with the toughest stand.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers kicked off a frantic anti-DPRK campaign under the pretexts of the DPRK's launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 and the second underground nuclear test last year but the DPRK took a resolute stand to cope with the campaign, the bulletin noted, and continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il watched splendid "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" displayed in the sky above Pyongyang and provided field guidance to various parts of the country including newly built power stations and a number of factories, enterprises and co-op farms.

articles.title: February Holiday Marked in Nepal, Denmark and Poland
articles.content:
February Holiday Marked in Nepal, Denmark and Poland
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Nepal, Denmark and Poland on Feb. 8 and 9 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The Nepalese minister of Youth and Sports, C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), and Ram Krishna Karmacharya, president of the National Press Club of Nepal, said that the DPRK has increased military capacity and firmly defended socialism and peace and security on the Korean Peninsula relying on it under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il. The miracles and innovations made by the Korean people in socialist construction are a fruition of his wise leadership, they added.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, expressed belief that the grand goal set by the Workers' Party of Korea to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, will be successfully attained under the wise Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Poland-Korea Association said that Kim Jong Il has given field guidance to various domains of the national economy across the country from the outset of the New Year. He praised the forced march made by Kim Jong Il out of patriotism and wished the Korean people greater success in the struggle to build a thriving nation and reunify the country.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in Nepal and Denmark.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance of State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance of State Merited Chorus
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated together with KPA servicepersons a performance given by the State Merited Chorus.
					 The State Merited Chorus put on the stage male chorus "He Is Our Illustrious Commander of Songun", "Old Home Covered with Snow", "We Long for You, General" and mixed duet and male chorus "Joy in February" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the undying leadership feats performed by Kim Jong Il in reinforcing the Party and the revolutionary armed forces and building a rich and powerful country under the uplifted banner of Songun and the high national pride and dignity of the Korean people being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation and successfully represented the unshakable faith and will of the service personnel and people to follow him single-mindedly and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the artistes presented a splendid performance replete with the faith and will of the DPRK and the revolutionary soldier spirit. He highly appreciated their success in the performance. 
					
					 Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, and other commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors of the C.C., the WPK Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il and  Kim Yang Gon and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance of KPA Unit 10215
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance of KPA Unit 10215
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the art squad of KPA Unit 10215.
					 Members of the art squad put on the stage narrative and song "New Year Greetings to You, Leader", female quintet "A Dear Name", dialogic poem "Care under which We Live,  Believing in You as in Heaven" and other colorful numbers of diverse genres.
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the invincible might of the heroic KPA which has grown to be a matchless army, the best death-defying corps defending the leader under his care and the firm faith and will of the servicepersons to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and provide a firm guarantee for the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms.
					
					 They, at the same time, fully demonstrated the proud appearance of the army artistes instilling the ardent love for the Party and the leader, the country and the people into the servicepersons and creditably discharging their sacred mission as buglers in the era of Songun.
					
					 Kim Jong Il highly appreciated the successful performance given by the members of the art squad, expressing great satisfaction with the fact that they staged a unique and militant performance with art pieces of great cognitive and educational value fully reflecting the inexhaustible mental power of the servicepersons.
					
					 Saying that performing activities are of weighty significance in the ideological education of the service personnel, he set forth important tasks that would serve as guidelines for further intensifying the revolutionary and militant performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, U Tong Chuk, member of the NDC of the DPRK, and other commanding officers of the army and Secretaries of the C.C., the WPK Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance of KPA Unit 963
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance of KPA Unit 963
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the art squad of KPA Unit 963.
					 Members of the art squad put on the stage female trio "The Great Bear Is the Star Representing Our Longing," dialogic poem "Let Us Meet Again in Huichon", serial songs "The County I Am Defending", "Our Country Is Witnessing Changes" and "Push Back the Frontiers of Science," and poem and chorus "We Will Defend the Headquarters of the Revolution with Our Lives" and other colorful numbers of diverse genres.
					
					 The performers successfully represented the invincible might of the KPA which has grown to be a matchless army under his care and the firm faith and will of the servicepersons to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and accomplish with arms the revolutionary cause of Juche which was started in the forest of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They clearly proved the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy of conducting anti-Japanese guerrilla style performing activities by fully demonstrating the same enthusiasm and spirit as displayed in conducting militant frontline information service and agitation by trenches, in drill grounds and construction sites to arouse service personnel to feats. They, at the same time, strikingly demonstrated the might of the army artistes creditably discharging their sacred mission as buglers in the era of Songun by instilling the ardent love for the Party and the leader, the country and the people into the servicepersons. 
					
					 At the end of the performance Kim Jong Il waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful presentation. 
					
					 He  extended high appreciation and thanks to the members of the art squad for their success in the performance, expressing great satisfaction with the fact that they staged a unique and splendid performance with art pieces truthfully representing the noble ideological and moral world of the servicepersons.
					
					 Saying that performing activities with strong influence are of great importance in the ideological education of the service personnel, he set forth important tasks to be fulfilled to intensify the performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, and other commanding officers of the army and Secretaries of the C.C., the WPK Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors of the C.C., the WPK Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il and Kim Yang Gon and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Gambian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Gambian President
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh, President of Gambia, on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing confidence that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Gambia would grow stronger in the future, Kim in the message sincerely wished the President greater success in his work for peace and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Ceremony Marks Completion of Hyangsan Hotel Renovation
articles.content:
Ceremony Marks Completion of Hyangsan Hotel Renovation
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Hyangsan Hotel in Mt. Myohyang, a world-famous mountain, was successfully renovated as required by the new century. 
					The bedrooms of various sizes and styles, restaurants, a theater, a banquet hall and a swimming pool and other cultural and public service facilities of the modern Hyangsan Hotel have been renovated on the best level. This is another laudable structure renovated under a far-reaching plan of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who regards it as his lifelong maxim to believe in people as in Heaven.
					
					The soldier-builders worked such astonishing miracle as successfully completing the vast project of carrying out the renovation in an area of more than 40,000 square meters in a short span of time by giving full play to the revolutionary soldier spirit.
					
					 The renovation of the hotel in Mt. Myohyang, a major tourist destination, as the best hotel made it possible to provide excellent conditions for lodging and cultural life to the visitors.
					
					 A ceremony took place on the spot on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, and other commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs and Secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, department directors and first vice department directors and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK, officials concerned and employees of the hotel. 
					
					 Choe Thae Bok said in a speech made at the ceremony that the hotel modernly renovated as required by the new century is crystal of the ceaseless great loving care shown by Kim Jong Il for the people.
					
					 He recalled that Kim Jong Il, who has worked heart and soul to provide the people with the best things, personally initiated the above-said project, though very busy with steering the drive for building a thriving nation, and wisely led the work to turn the hotel into the best hotel. 
					
					 Thanks to his energetic leadership and meticulous care, the soldier- builders worked such an astonishing miracle as renovating the hotel as a laudable monumental edifice in the Songun era in a matter of less than four months, the speaker noted.
					
					 Fully reflected in the slogan "We Serve the People!" are the steadfast will and resolution of the WPK to devote everything to the people's happiness, placing their interests above anything else, he said, calling upon the employees of the hotel to bear in mind the heavy mission to serve the people and steadily improve the service so that they may more fully benefit from Kim Jong Il's profound loving care.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants looked round the exterior and interior of the magnificent and fashionable hotel.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppets Accused of Working on "Unification Constitution"
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppets Accused of Working on "Unification Constitution"
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The conservative ruling forces in south Korea are making arrangements to institute what they called "unification constitution".
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The conservative ruling forces are now peddling the theory of "the unification of systems" veiled with the words "national community" quite contrary to the trend of the June 15 era of reunification though it had been thrown into the dumping ground of history long ago. 
					
					 Puppet Prime Minister Jong Un Chan asserted that after the country's unification the idea and form of the state should be based on liberal democracy and market economy, thus betraying his black-hearted intention to work hard for putting the north under "liberal democracy" of south Korea. 
					
					 The "proposal for the unification of the national community" is nothing but a scenario seeking confrontation of systems aimed to do harm to fellow countrymen and a war scenario. 
					
					 It is unpardonable act of treachery designed to impose confrontation of systems and a nuclear disaster upon the fellow countrymen aspiring after the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 Just as a family on the verge of ruin is ridden with dispute, south Korea is torn with everyday scramble. The reckless acts of the conservative group to do harm to the DPRK's system cannot be interpreted otherwise than a hysteric fit. The above-said racket kicked up by the group will only bring the consequences of getting their stronghold blown up. Then it will be too late for the group to regret for it. 
					
					 The conservative forces of south Korea had better awaken from the nightmare of achieving "unification under liberal democracy".

articles.title: DPRK FM Statement Supported by Malta
articles.content:
DPRK FM Statement Supported by Malta
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of Juche Philosophy and Songun Politics of Malta issued a statement on Feb. 10 in support of the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We extend full support to the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty.
					
					 Peace and security on the Korean Peninsula are an important issue related to global peace and security.
					
					 The process for the denuclearization of the peninsula sustained a setback because there was no confidence among the parties to the six-party talks.
					
					 If the AA is replaced with a peace treaty, confidence will be built between the DPRK and the U.S. and the process for the denuclearization of the peninsula be pushed forward at a rapid tempo.
					
					 We strongly urge the U.S. government to positively respond to the proposal of the DPRK for ensuring lasting peace on the peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC), Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional (CDN) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (RPDC) y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC), junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC, presencio la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito.
					  Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena el coro masculino "El es nuestro genial comandante del Songun", "Casa natal cubierta de copos de nieve" y "Anorando al General", el duo mixto y coro masculino "Jubilo de febrero" y otras piezas.
					
					  Mediante la funcion, ellos cantaron con gran emocion las inmortales hazanas directivas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il acumuladas en el desarrollo del partido y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias bajo la bandera del Songun y en la construccion de la patria prospera, el gran orgullo y dignidad nacionales del pueblo coreano que disfruta de generacion en generacion de la direccion del gran lider y del insigne general, y mostraron bien la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo siempre al Dirigente.
					
					  El Dirigente evaluo altamente los exitos de los artistas del coro logrados en la funcion mostrandose muy satisfecho de que estos hayan ofrecido tal excelente funcion que refleja bien la conviccion y la voluntad de Corea y el espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					  Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, y otros miembros de mando del ejercito y de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas, los secretarios del CC del PTC Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de grupo de propaganda artistica de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de grupo de propaganda artistica de EPC
						
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la Unidad 10215 del EPC.
					Los integrantes del grupo de propaganda artistica pusieron en la escena la narracion y cancion "Rendimos nuestro saludo por el Ano Nuevo", el quinteto femenino "Nombre querido", el poema en dialogo "Regazo en que vivimos creyendo como el cielo" y otras piezas de diversas formas.
					
					A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes mostraron bien el invencible poderio del heroico EPC, crecido como el poderoso ejercito sin rival y el primer peloton suicida para la defensa al lider bajo la guia del gran insigne comandante, la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los militares del EPC dispuestos a garantizar con firmeza con armas la causa de la construccion de gran potencia prospera socialista y la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Ademas, ellos manifestaron sin reserva el poderio de los artistas militares que cumplen excelentemente la sagrada mision de trompetero de la epoca del Songun sembrando en el corazon de los uniformados el ardiente amor al partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					El Comandante Supremo se mostro muy satisfecho de que los integrantes del grupo de propaganda artistica de la unidad hayan realizado de combativo la funcion con las excelentes obras  de gran significacion cognoscitiva y educativa que reflejan vividamente la inagotable fuerza espiritual de nuestros militares y evaluo altamente el exito de su  funcion.
					
					Diciendo que la propaganda artistica tiene suma importancia en la educacion ideologica de los militares, el Comandante Supremo presento las programaticas tareas que sirven de guia para fortalecer las actividades de propaganda artistica revolucionaria y combativa.
					
					Le acompanaron en verla el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, U Tong Chuk, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y otros miembros de mando del ejercito, los secretarios del CC del PTC Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Clausurado el XIX Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico
articles.content:
Clausurado el XIX Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico 
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ATCC) -- Quedo clausurado el dia 17 en el capitalino Complejo de Patinaje bajo Techo el XIX Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico por el Premio Paektusan inaugurado el dia 15 en ocasion del cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					En el acto clausural participaron Kwak Pom Gi y Pak Su Gil, viceprimeros ministros del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Yong Dae, presidente del CC del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea y otros funcionarios, deportistas y trabajadores en la capital.
					
					Tambien, estuvo presente el grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon presidido por su vicepresidente Ri Ki Sok.
					
					Se efectuo la premiacion a los jugadores que mostraron la alta tecnica en este festival.
					
					Pak Hak Son, presidente del Comite Coreano de Direccion de Deportes expreso la conviccion de que en el futuro tambien los patinaderos artisticos de varios paises contribuiran a celebrar la fiesta de febrero bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad y declaro la clausura del festival.
					
					Acto seguido, tuvo lugar la actuacion modelo de los patinaderos artisticos de Corea y otros paises.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena a los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena a los titeres surcoreanos
						
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ATCC) -- En el comentario individual del dia 17 el periodico Minju Joson condena a las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas en el Poder que preparan la supuesta "constitucion de Corea reunificada".
					  Esas fuerzas surcoreanas, al nadar a contrapelo de la corriente de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio, difunden la teoria de la "reunificacion mediante la fusion de los regimenes" echada en el basurero de la historia poniendole la mascara de la "comunidad nacional".
					
					  Asi senalo el comentarista y continuo:
					
					  El primer ministro titere Jong Un Chan dijo que "el ideal y el tipo del Estado despues de ser lograda la reunificacion tomaran por lo principal la democracia liberal y la economia de mercado" revelando asi su ambicion negra de extender el "sistema democratico liberal" del Sur de Corea a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  El "proyecto de reunificacion mediante la comunidad nacional" deviene el guion por la confrontacion institucional y el de guerra para danar a los connacionales.
					
					  Resulta un imperdonable acto traidor el imponer la confrontacion institucional y la catastrofe nuclear a los connacionales que anhelan la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais.
					
					  Dicen que en la familia que va a arruinarse suelen las peleas.
					
					  Ahora, en el Sur de Corea se libran dia por dia las peleas internas.
					
					  En tal situacion, la conducta de la banda de  conservadores surcoreanos, que se atreve a atentar al regimen de la RPDC, no pasa de ser un acto histerico.
					
					  Los estupidos alborotos de enfrentamiento entre regimenes y de guerra de esa banda traeran solo el resultado de eliminar de raiz su baluarte. Entonces, no tendra el tiempo de arrepentirse.
					
					  Ella debe despertarse de la pesadilla de la "reunificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal".
